title: Hands-on: Google Pixel’s new battery widget works with most Bluetooth earbuds, not Wear OS
content:
Google just added a new battery widget to its Pixel phones, allowing users at-a-glance battery levels for their phone and some connected devices. Here’s how it works, what devices it works with, and its one big omission.

more…

The post Hands-on: Google Pixel’s new battery widget works with most Bluetooth earbuds, not Wear OS appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has released a new battery widget for its Pixel smartphones which can show battery levels for connected devices, but not Wear OS.
